lead_paragraph: There was Roger Federer, so famous for his flawless footwork, flat on his stomach, face down and motionless on the Centre Court grass after jamming the toe of his left shoe and stumbling during what turned out to be the fifth set's pivotal game in his Wimbledon semifinal.

headline.main: Fall, Double-Faults Hurt Federer in Wimbledon Loss to Raonic
headline.print_headline: Fall, Double-Faults Hurt Federer in Wimbledon Loss to Raonic
